nodes.text: Okyaab 6 was a planet in the Galactic Republic. It was located in a small frontier system. It was a peaceful place inhabited by artisans and farmers. Its people were known as the Okyaabi. It was conquered and enslaved by the Mandalorians during the Mandalorian Wars for less than a week before the Okyaabi revolted and retook their world, rejoining the Republic. Benegryph Goodvalor used their success to try to demoralize the Mandalorians in propaganda. When asked about the incident by his recruits, Koblus Sornell claimed he'd never heard of Okyaab 6.
